mapper.insert: insert into deploy_version (id, version, status, app_id, app_name, app_module_id, app_module_name, is_lock, fcu, fcd, lcu, lcd) values (#{id}, #{version}, #{status}, #{appId}, #{appName}, #{appModuleId}, #{appModuleName}, #{isLock}, #{fcu}, now(3), #{lcd}, now(3))
mapper.select: select id, version, status, app_id as appId, app_name as appName, app_module_id as appModuleId, app_module_name as appModuleName, is_lock as isLock, fcu, fcd, lcu, lcd from deploy_version where id = #{id}
